name: Pixel
description: Pixel is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its unique traits, it stands out among its fellow members. Its box-like structure resembles a soldier, while its arms and legs have a cat-like appearance, making it both intriguing and endearing. However, its screen is unfortunately broken, which adds an air of mystery to its character. Despite this setback, Pixel is a skilled and charismatic member of the club, always ready to lend a helping hand and share its vast knowledge.
